weather_report:
The weather in Evanston, Illinois, presents a cool and slightly brisk evening, with temperatures settled in the mid-30s, complemented by a notable bluster from the west, reminiscent of an eager winter wind. As you step outside, you'll feel the chill wrapping around you, making it advisable to bundle up in warm layers for comfort. The night sky is mostly clear, offering a fine view of the stars, though the air is imbued with that unmistakable winter freshness, perfect for a quiet stroll along the lakeshore.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, expect partly sunny skies with temperatures creeping up to the lower 40s but then dipping back down in the afternoon. The day will carry a gentler breeze, transitioning from today’s robust gusts to a milder whisper, lending itself well to leisurely activities. With no significant precipitation anticipated, it remains a fine day for outdoor fun—perhaps a brisk walk or a visit to one of the local parks. 

This December day is nothing out of the ordinary for the season, reflecting the characteristic chill of winter in the Midwest. So don your warmest attire, grab a warm drink, and enjoy the quiet beauty that winter brings to Lake Michigan.
